articles.author: Lukas Weese
articles.title: Texas Tech coach tells fans to stop throwing debris on court vs. Texas - The Athletic
articles.description: Texas thumped Texas Tech 81-69, handing the Red Raiders their third loss in the last four games.
articles.content:
An ejection. Multiple technical fouls. Fans throwing debris on the court. Texas Tech coach Grant McCasland getting on the mic and telling fans to stop throwing objects.
Just another chapter of the T… [+2204 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Apple parks electric car project - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: As enthusiasm for the tech wanes, markets approve of company’s decision to shift employees to burgeoning AI sector.
articles.content:
US tech giant Apple has reportedly pulled the plug on its electric car project after a decade of investment into the technology, devoting more resources to artificial intelligence (AI).
